source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_220<tab>No, this will not do. No, no. Not if the righteous are to rise triumphant.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_220<tab>足りぬ……この程度では……。
悪を討つ力は得られん……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_221<tab>Where art thou, O bearer promised? Hand worthy to wield the blade. Just and true...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_221<tab>担い手を……見つけねば……。
心正しき担い手を……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_230<tab>By all means, convince me I'm wrong. Tell me there's a way.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_230<tab>はあ……厄介すぎるぜ……。
何か「アレ」を上手く使う方法はねえのかよ。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_231<tab>A “bearer just and true,” if the accounts are to be believed.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_231<tab>ふむ……。
伝承によれば「心正しき担い手」であったか。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_232<tab>How wonderfully subjective. So one with such qualities would be judged worthy and therefore be in no danger? Simple as that?
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_232<tab>心正しい者なら扱えると？
それだけならば、何も問題がないように聞こえるが。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_233<tab>(-Galuf-)As if anything about this is simple. We already know that prolonged exposure places the bearer's very soul at hazard. By the time the others even realized, the eikon had already prevailed.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_233<tab>(-若き日のガラフ-)いや、ことはそう単純じゃない。
そもそも、使い続ければ心を侵され、
周囲が気づく頃には闘神の完成だぞ？

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_235<tab>Then until we can conceive of a method to completely and utterly starve it of aether, we can but maintain the status quo. Vexing as it is.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_235<tab>エーテルを削り切るための方策が思いつかない以上、
業腹ではあるが、現状維持しかあるまい。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_236<tab>In so doing we merely pass our problems to the next generation. Sever the streams, “seal” it away─our every measure can be defeated. All our progress, reversed...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_236<tab>とはいえ、地脈から切り離し、封印を続けたとて、
いずれ再び解放されるのは明白。
なにか逆転の一手が必要ではあるが……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_237<tab>Bah. Who would've thought that aether could be so damn hard to manipulate?
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_237<tab>なんかこう、エーテルをばーっと流す方法が、
どっかに転がってないかねえ……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_238<tab>(-Galuf-)Sever the streams... Bah, that won't do. Alter? No...
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_238<tab>(-若き日のガラフ-)地脈……逆転……エーテルを流す……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_239<tab>Galuf's got that look again. Any moment now he'll be saying...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_239<tab>おい、どうしたガラフ。
なにか気にかかることでもあったか？
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_240<tab>(-若き日のガラフ-)……そうか、思いついたぞ！

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_241<tab>(-Galuf-)My friends, victory is not beyond us. There is a simple method by which we may yet “reverse” our fortunes. To wit, we reverse the flow!
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_241<tab>(-若き日のガラフ-)どうすれば「アレ」を討滅できるか、
方法を思いついたんだ。
……そう、流れを逆転させるんだよ！

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>The masked man is nowhere to be found. However, you spy a small object near where last you saw him...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>謎めいた男がいたあたりに、何かが落ちている……。
近づいて、調べてみよう。
